    • Player

      public Player​(int x, int y, Level level, boolean b, int i, java.lang.String nome)
      Class constructor
      Parameters:
      x - starting position of the player that will be immediately updated
      y - starting position of the player that will be immediately updated
      level - the level in this moment
      b - player's turn
      i - number of the player
      nome - this player's name
